messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Oh my God! Oh my God!
This is 9-1-1. I need you to stop screaming so I can hear you.
Oh my God! My boyfriend, he’s been hurt! He needs an ambulance!
What's wrong with him? What happened?
Oh my God, he was shot in the head with a gun!
Ma'am, I need you to calm down so I can understand you and send help. Take a deep breath. What's going on?
Hurry! Hurry! He’s not breathing!
Listen to me, I'm going to transfer you to the paramedics. They're going to give you CPR instructions. Do not hang up, okay?
Okay, I understand. Please hurry!
Baby, baby! Oh my God, no!
This is the fire department. What's the address of the emergency?
Come quick! He needs help!
I need your phone number.
It's [phone number]. Please, come quick!
Okay, help is on the way. Why exactly what happened?
He was joking with a gun, and it went off. Oh my God, help!
Ma'am, I'm sending the paramedics to you now.
Right away, please! He put the gun to his head and it just went off.
Help is on the way. Stay with him and don't hang up the phone.
